artist: Etcher: Paulo Farinati; Printer: Ju. Sadler
description: St. John with book on lap; quill PR hand in ink pot; bird (eagle?) lower left; dove upper right
inscription:
Inscription

in  plate at bottom in black: [Paulus Farinatus Veronesis fecit/ IU. Sadeler execudit./ Paulo Ferinato    f. 1567]; on mount in pencil LL: [B3ii/ii]; on mount verso in pencil: [ St. John the Evangelist BXVI 3 ii/ii]
title: St. John the Evangelist
